scripts.lint: eslint . --ext ts,tsx --max-warnings 0 && cd app && eslint . --ext ts,tsx --report-unused-disable-directives --max-warnings 0
scripts.lint:fix: eslint . --ext ts,tsx --fix --max-warnings 0 && cd app && eslint . --ext ts,tsx --fix --report-unused-disable-directives --max-warnings 0
scripts.dev:api:delayed: sleep 2 && cd api && bun run dev
scripts.dev: bun build:sdk && concurrently -n sdk,api,app -c cyan,green,yellow "bun run dev:sdk" "bun run dev:api:delayed" "bun run dev:app"
scripts.build: bun run build:sdk && concurrently "bun run build:api" "bun run build:app"
